concept.title: Formatting display of locale-sensitive data
concept.shortdesc: To display dates, timestamps, numbers, and times in the format of the ij Session locale, use the LocalizedDisplay command.

p.note: These options do not change the way stores locale-sensitive data, simply the way the tool displays the data.

conbody.p: The following example demonstrates the use of LocalizedDisplay in an en_US locale: ij> VALUES CURRENT_DATE; 1 ---------- 2011-05-23 1 row selected ij> localizeddisplay on; ij> VALUES CURRENT_DATE; 1 ------------------ May 23, 2011 1 row selected
